sentence:
Mr. FALLON. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize Mr. Ralph O'Dell  of Celina, Texas, and present him with the Congressional Patriot Award.  Ralph has dedicated himself to faithfully serving our community and  country.

Ralph is a veteran of the Second World War and served with the United  States…

Originally from Sherman, Texas, Punk moved with his family to Celina  and graduated from high…
